comment: To those saying it’s a drop in the ocean compared to the whole country, I say it DOES matter given 1 person can infect thousands. Without quarantine at airports we maintain a pool of infection entering the country which does NOT flatten the curve and does NOT protect the NHS.
amr:
# ::snt To those saying it’s a drop in the ocean compared to the whole country, I say it DOES matter given 1 person can infect thousands. Without quarantine at airports we maintain a pool of infection entering the country which does NOT flatten the curve and does NOT protect the NHS.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (m2 / matter-01

                              :ARG1 (ii3 / infect-01
                                    :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                          :quant 1)
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                          :quant (m3 / multiple
                                                :op1 1000))))))
            :ARG2 (p4 / person
                  :mod (t / that)

                              :ARG1-of (c2 / compare-01
                                    :ARG2 (c3 / country
                                          :mod (w / whole)))))))
      :snt2 (m4 / maintain-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)

                  :ARG0-of (p6 / protect-01
                        :polarity -

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "NHS"))))
            :condition (q / quarantine-01
